mapper.select: SELECT v.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, v.vehicle_status AS vehicleStatus, v.vehicle_no AS vehicleNo, v.vehicle_type AS vehicleType, v.vehicle_name AS vehicleName, CASE WHEN r.vehicle_reservation_start_time IS NULL THEN '' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(r.vehicle_reservation_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') END AS reservationStart, CASE WHEN r.vehicle_reservation_end_time IS NULL THEN '' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(r.vehicle_reservation_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') END AS reservationEnd FROM vehicle v LEFT JOIN vehicle_reservation r ON v.vehicle_id = r.vehicle_id ORDER BY v.vehicle_id LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
